snippet.title: This is Inferni: Hope & Fear. Wishlist now on Steam
snippet.description:
Welcome to Inferni: Hope & Fear, the world's first deck builder battle royale game! Dive into a nostalgic journey inspired by classic card games from the 90s, now reimagined with a modern twist. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience where strategic deck building meets intense real-time battles.

Created by industry veterans from SEGA and Rovio, Inferni: Hope & Fear is more than just a game; it's a homage to the golden era of card gaming, filled with nostalgia and innovative gameplay.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/Inferni
